text:
Edward Joseph "Ed" McGuire (born 29 October 1964) is an Australian radio and television presenter, commentator, journalist and businessman. He is known for his long relation with Australian rules football and the Nine Network. His media company is known as McGuire Media. He is the current president of the AFL Collingwood Football Club and Melbourne Stars Twenty20 cricket team. He is also the current host of Channel Nine game show "Millionaire Hot Seat" (2009–present). He formerly hosted the Australian version of game show "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?" (1999–2007). He is also an Australian rules football commentator for Fox Footy, and a columnist for the "Herald Sun".
McGuire was born in Melbourne, Victoria. He is married to Carla. The couple have two sons.

annotations.surface_form: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?
